props.closeOnClick: Designates if menu should close on outside-activator click
props.closeOnContentClick: Designates if menu should close when its content is clicked
props.closeDelay: Milliseconds to wait before closing component. Only works with the **open-on-hover** prop
props.disableKeys: Supprime toute interaction avec le clavier
props.internalActivator: Détache le contenu du menu à l'intérieur du composant par opposition au document.
props.maxHeight: Sets the max height of the menu content
props.offsetX: Offset the menu on the x-axis. Works in conjunction with direction left/right
props.offsetY: Offset the menu on the y-axis. Works in conjunction with direction top/bottom
props.openDelay: Milliseconds to wait before opening component. Only works with the **open-on-hover** prop
props.openOnClick: Designates whether menu should open on activator click
props.openOnHover: Designates whether menu should open on activator hover
props.origin: Définit l'origine de la transition sur l'élément. Vous pouvez trouver plus d'informations sur la documentation MDN [pour l'origine de la transition](https://developer.mozilla.org/fr-US/docs/Web/CSS/transform-origin).
props.returnValue: The value that is updated when the menu is closed - must be primitive. Dot notation is supported
props.transition: Définit la transition du composant. Peut être l'une des [construites en transitions](/styles/transitions) ou l'autre de vos propres.
props.contentProps: Applies props/attributes to the detached menu. This is useful because the content is moved to the beginning of the `v-app` component (unless the attach prop is provided) and is not targetable by classes passed directly on the component. You could use this for example for applying a `data-cy` for cypress testing purposes.
